headline: Is Kraft Heinz (KHC) Now An Opportunity After Years Of Weak Share Price Performance
summary: If you are wondering whether Kraft Heinz is a bargain or a value trap at around US$23.87, you are not alone. This article is designed to help you frame that question clearly. The stock price has moved 0.7% over the last week, while the 1-year return of an 11.9% decline and 3-year return of a 29.9% decline show that many investors are still cautious despite shorter-term shifts. Recent news flow around Kraft Heinz has focused on how the company fits into broader consumer staples portfolios and...
